channel.title: Repeated cashes just before ascending ladder
channel.description: The famous moment just after the lift crashes down containing the scientists, I headed up the ladder, it begins a loading sequence and bam; hl2.exe has crashed. File attached. (By the way; thanks guys, awesome work) EDIT: apart from the crash, no graphical performance issues hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T21_43_12C0.mdmp (108 KB)

item.description:

item.title: Repeated cashes just before ascending ladder
item.dc:creator: ArshamKia
item.description:
The famous moment just after the lift crashes down containing the scientists, I headed up the ladder, it begins a loading sequence and bam; hl2.exe has crashed.

File attached.

(By the way; thanks guys, awesome work)

EDIT: apart from the crash, no graphical performance issues
